info.title: World Options WebServices
info.description: World Options WebServices are Rest based service with JSON request and response to integrate fetures of World Options in third party applications.

post.description: WO Tracking & POD Web service provides tracking and current status for shipment based on input tracking number.

requestBody.description:
# REQUEST DETAILS
Tracking & POD request consist of following elements:
  1. Authentication Details
  2. Shipment Details
------------------------------------
**Authentication Details**
| Element Name | Description | Is Required | Data Type | Length |
| ------- | -------- | ------ | ---- | ----- |
| Key | Customer Login Id | YES | string | 100 |
| Password | Customer Password | YES | string | 100 |
| MeterNumber | Reference Number | YES | string | 100 |
| PluginCode | Only used in case of request from plugin else can be left blank. | NO | string | 100 |
---------------------------------------------------------------
**Shipment Details**
| Element Name | Description | Is Required | Data Type | Length |
| ------- | -------- | ------ | ---- | ----- |
| TrackingNumber | Tracking no to be tracked and proof of delivery | YES | string | 100 |

200.description:
# RESONSE DETAILS
----------------------------
**Shipment Details**
| Element Name | Description | Data Type  |
| ------- | -------- | ------ | 
| NotificationType | Status of shipment tracking i.e. Success, Failed, Warning | String |
| Message | Message displaying shipment tracking status | String | 
| TrackingNumber | Master tracking number to be tracked | String | 
| POD Image Type | Informative Field – Shows Image type of POD which needs to be converted into respective file format. For instance    gif, pdf, jpg | String | 
| TrackingStatus | Object containing complete information of tracking & POD | Object | 
| TrackingStatus -> ActivityDetail | List of shipment tracking states at various instances from collection to delivery  |  List
| TrackingStatus->Carrier | Name of carrier of shipment | String | 
| TrackingStatus-> DeliveredTo | Contact name of person to whom shipment is delivered | String | 
| TrackingStatus-> DeliveredDate | Delivery date of shipment | DateTime | 
| TrackingStatus-> Destination | Shipment destination | String | 
| TrackingStatus-> Image | Label Image in byte array form which needs to be converted into respective file format | byte[] | 
| TrackingStatus-> ImageLength | Length of Image  | Int | 
| TrackingStatus-> ImageType | Informative Field – Shows Image type of POD which needs to be converted into respective file format. For instance gif, pdf, jpg | String | 
| TrackingStatus-> Reference | Shipper reference | String | 
| TrackingStatus-> ServiceType | Service type for shipment | String | 
| TrackingStatus-> ShipDate | Date of shipment | DateTime | 
| TrackingStatus-> SignedBy | Name of person signed on delivery | String | 
| TrackingStatus-> Status | Shipment status | String | 
| TrackingStatus-> Weight | Weight of shipment parcel | Decimal | 
| TrackingStatus-> WtUnit | Weight unit of shipment parcel - WeightUnits | Enum |

post.description: WO Void Shipment Web service is used to void shipment based on input tracking number.

requestBody.description:
# REQUEST DETAILS
Void Shipment request consist of following elements:
1. Authentication Details
2. Shipment Details
-------------------------------
**Authentication Details**
| Element Name | Description | Is Required | Data Type | Length |
| ------- | -------- | ------ | ---- | ----- |
| Key | Customer Login Id | YES | string | 100 |
| Password | Customer Password | YES | string | 100 |
| MeterNumber | Reference Number | YES | string | 100 |
| PluginCode | Only used in case of request from plugin else can be left blank. | NO | string | 100 |
---------------------------------------------------------------
**Shipment Details**
| Element Name | Description | Is Required | Data Type | Length |
| ------- | -------- | ------ | ---- | ----- |
| TrackingNumber | Tracking no to be voided | YES | string | 100 |

200.description:
# RESONSE DETAILS
----------------------------
**Shipment Details**
| Element Name | Description | Data Type  |
| ------- | -------- | ------ | 
| NotificationType | Status of void shipment i.e. Success or Failed | String | 
| Message | Message displaying void shipment | String |

post.description:
Through 'WO Rate Web service', rates for many or single carrier services can be obtained based on input parameters such as dimensions, sender and receiver details, etc.

# Table 1.1 - Service Name List
 ----------------------------
 | Sr. No. | Service Name |
 | ------- | -------- |
 | 1. | DHL |
 | 2. | FEDEX |
 | 3. | UPS |
 | 4. | TNT |
 | 5. | YODEL |
 | 6. | DHLPARCEL |
 | 7. | DXExpress |
 
 # Table 1.2 – Service Type List
 ----------------------------
 **DHL Service Type List**
 | Sr. No. | Service Name |
 | ------- | -------- |
 | 1. | DHL_Worldwide_Express |
 | 2. | DHL_ECONOMY_SELECT |
 | 3. | DHL_DOMESTIC_EXPRESS |
 | 4. | DHL_WORLDWIDE_EXPRESS_900 |
 | 5. | DHL_WORLDWIDE_EXPRESS_1200 |
 | 6. | DHL_DOMESTIC_EXPRESS_900 |
 | 7. | DHL_ DOMESTIC_EXPRESS _1200 |
 

 **UPS Service Type List**
 | Sr. No.  | Service Type Name |
 |----------|------------------|
 | 1.    | UPS_Express |
 | 2.   | UPS_Standard |
 | 3.    | UPS_Express_Plus |
 | 4.    | UPS_Expedited |
 | 5.    | UPS_Express_Saver |
 | 6.    | UPS_Standard_Multiple |
  
 **YODEL Service Type List**
 | Sr. No.  | Service Type Name |
 |----------|------------------|
 | 1.    | YODEL_EXPRESS_24 |
 | 2.   | YODEL_EXPRESS_48 |
 | 3.    | YODEL_EXPRESS_NI |
 | 4.    | YODEL_PRIORITY_1000  |
 | 5.   | YODEL_PRIORITY_1200 |
 | 6.    | YODEL_SATURDAY_1000 |
 | 7.    | YODEL_SATURDAY |
 | 8.   | YODEL_EXPRESS_ISLE |
 | 9.    | YODEL_HOME_24 |
 | 10.  | YODEL_HOME_NI |
 | 11.  | YODEL_HOME_24BT |
 | 12.  | YODEL_HOME_48 |
 | 13.  | YODEL_HOME_72 |
 | 14.  | YODEL_HOME_72_NI |
 | 15.  | YODEL_HOME_SATURDAY |
 | 16.  | YODEL_HOME_EXPRESS_ISLE |
 
 
 **Fedex Service Type List**
 | Sr. No. | Service Name |
 | ------- | -------------|
 | 1. | Fedex_International_First |
 | 2. | Fedex_International_Priority |
 | 3. | Fedex_International_Priority_Freight |
 
 **DHL Parcel Service Type List**
 | Sr. No.  | Service Type Name | 
 |----------|-------------------|
 | 1.    | UKMail_Express_UK_AM |
 | 2.   | UKMail_Express_UK_1030AM |
 | 3.    | UKMail_Express_UK_1030AM |
 | 4.    | UKMail_Express_UK_Saturday |
 | 5.   | UKMail_Express_UK_Saturday_1030AM |
 | 6.    | UKMail_Express_UK_Saturday_0900AM |
 | 7.    | UKMail_Express_UK_Bagit |
 | 8.    | UKMail_Express_UK_AM_Bagit |
 | 9.    | UKMail_Express_UK_1030AM_Bagit |
 | 10.  | UKMail_Express_UK_0900AM_Bagit |
 | 11.  | UKMail_Express_UK_Saturday_Bagit |
 | 12.  | UKMail_European_Road |
 
 **DXExpress Service Type List**
 | Sr. No.  | Service Type Name | 
 |----------|-------------------|
 | 1.    | DXExpress_B2C_Next_Day_Business | 
 | 2.   | DXExpress_B2C_Next_Day_Business_Pre_12_PM | 
 | 3.    | DXExpress_B2C_Saturday_Delivery | 
 | 4.    | DXExpress_B2C_Saturday_Pre_12 | 
 | 5.   | DXExpress_B2B_Next_Day_Home_Signature | 
 | 6.    | DXExpress_B2B_Next_Day_Home_Signature_Pre_1PM | 
 | 7.    | DXExpress_B2B_Saturday_Delivery_Signature | 
 | 8.   | DXExpress_B2B_Next_Day_Home_No_Signature |

 # Table 1.3 – Package Type List
 -------------------------------

 **UPS Package Type List**

 **DXExpress Package Type List**

 **ALL Package Type List**

requestBody.description:
# REQUEST DETAILS
Rate request consist of following elements:
1. AuthenticationDetail
2. SenderDetails
3. RecipientDetails
4. ShipmentDetails
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
**Authentication Details**
| Element Name | Description | Is Required | Data Type | Length |
| ------- | -------- | ------ | ---- | ----- |
| Key | Customer Login Id | YES | string | 100 |
| Password | Customer Password | YES | string | 100 |
| MeterNumber | Reference Number | YES | string | 100 |
| PluginCode | Only used in case of request from plugin else can be left blank. | NO | string | 100 |

---------------------------------------------------------------
**Sender Details**
| Element Name | Description | Is Required | Data Type | Length |
| ------- | -------- | ------ | ---- | ----- |
| CollectionCity | Sender City Name (Valid chars a-z OR A-Z OR 0-9) | YES | string | 100 |
| CollectionPostCode | City Post Code (Valid chars a-z OR A-Z OR 0-9) | YES | string | 100 |
| CollectionCountryCode | Two letter ISO Country code of sender | YES | string | 100 |

 ---------------------------------------------------------------
**Recipient  Details**
| Element Name | Description | Is Required | Data Type | Length |
| ------- | -------- | ------ | ---- | ----- |
| DeliveryCountryCode | Two letter ISO Country code of recipient | YES | string | 100 |
| DeliveryState | State code for recipient state | YES | string | 100 |
| DeliveryCity | Recipient City Name (Valid chars a-z OR A-Z OR 0-9) | YES | string | 100 |
| DeliveryPostCode | City Post Code (Valid chars a-z OR A-Z OR 0-9) | YES | string | 100 |
| IsResidential | Is Recipient address residential? | NO | Boolean | 100 |

---------------------------------------------------------------
**Shipping  Details**
| Element Name | Description | Is Required | Data Type | Length |
| ------- | -------- | ------ | ---- | ----- |
| ShipmentType | Type of shipment – ShipmentMode. Type of shipment can be Export, Import or Domestic. | YES | Enum |  |
| ServiceName | Service Company Type code – wsServiceCompanyTypes. Specify ALL if quote for all carrier services is needed. (Refer Table 1.1 for service company list) | NO |   Enum |  |
| ServiceTypeName | Service type code corresponding to the service type – wsServiceTypes. Specify ALL if service name selected is   ALL. (Refer Table 1.2 for service type list) | NO | Enum |  |
| PackageType | Package type code corresponding to the service type code – wsRatePackageTypes. Package type should be specific to   carrier if we selected a particular service name or it can be Any_Document or Any_NonDocument if service name selected is ALL. (Refer Table 1.3 for package type list) |   Yes | Enum |  |
| PackageDetails | Details of the package – wsShippingDetail.PackageDetail  | Yes(if Non Document) | Struct |  |
| PackageDetails -> ItemNumber | Sr. No of package in a collection  | Yes | Int |  |
| PackageDetails -> Weight | Weight of package (Valid char’s 0-9.) | Yes | Decimal |  |
| PackageDetails -> Length | Length of package (Valid char’s 0-9.) | Yes | Decimal |  |
| PackageDetails -> Breadth | Breadth of package (Valid char’s 0-9.) | Yes | Decimal |  |
| PackageDetails -> Height | Height of package (Valid char’s 0-9.) | Yes | Decimal |  |
| PackageDetails -> CustomValue | Custom value (Valid char’s 0-9.) | Yes (If Non-European shipments) | Decimal |  |

200.description:
# RESONSE DETAILS
----------------------------
**Shipment Details**
| Element Name | Description | Data Type  |
| ------- | -------- | ------ | 
| NotificationType | Status of shipment tracking i.e. Success, Failed, Warning | String | 
| Message | Message displaying shipment tracking status | String | 
| wsAvailableServicesAndRates | This will contain service information and rate details | Container | 
| wsAvailableServicesAndRates -> wsServiceCode | Code of the carrier service. | String | 
| wsAvailableServicesAndRates -> wsServiceTypeCode | Service type code corresponding to the carrier service code (wsServiceCode). |     String | 
| wsAvailableServicesAndRates -> wsServiceTypeName | Service type name corresponding to the carrier service type code     (wsServiceTypeCode). | String | 
| wsAvailableServicesAndRates -> wsPackageTypeCode | Package type code corresponding to the carrier service code. (wsServiceCode).    | String | 
| wsAvailableServicesAndRates -> wsPickupDateTime | Pickup Date Time for the carrier. Pick up Date Time will be returned only, if     either of Collection and Delivery post codes or Collection and Delivery city is provided.| DateTime | 
| wsAvailableServicesAndRates -> wsDeliveryDateTime | Delivery Date Time for the carrier. Delivery Date Time will be returned only,     if either of Collection and Delivery post codes or Collection and Delivery city is provided. | DateTime | 
| wsAvailableServicesAndRates -> wsQuoteDetails | This will contain rate details. | Container | 
| wsAvailableServicesAndRates -> wsQuoteDetails-> BaseCharge | Base Charge | Decimal |
| wsAvailableServicesAndRates -> wsQuoteDetails-> FuelSurcharge | FuelSurcharge | Decimal | 
| wsAvailableServicesAndRates -> wsQuoteDetails-> ExtAreaSurcharge | Extended Area Surcharge | Decimal | 
| wsAvailableServicesAndRates -> wsQuoteDetails-> ExtAreaFuelSurcharge | Extended Area Fuel Surcharge | Decimal | 
| wsAvailableServicesAndRates -> wsQuoteDetails-> ResidentialCharge | Residential Charge | Decimal | 
| wsAvailableServicesAndRates -> wsQuoteDetails-> ResidentialFuelSurcharge | Residential Fuel Surcharge | Decimal | 
| wsAvailableServicesAndRates -> wsQuoteDetails-> AdditionalHandlingCharge | AdditionalHandling Charge | Decimal | 
| wsAvailableServicesAndRates -> wsQuoteDetails-> AdministrationCharge | Administration Charge | Decimal | 
| wsAvailableServicesAndRates -> wsQuoteDetails-> LargePackageSurcharge | Large Package Surcharge | Decimal | 
| wsAvailableServicesAndRates -> wsQuoteDetails-> LargePackageFuelSurcharge | Large Package Fuel Surcharge | Decimal | 
| wsAvailableServicesAndRates -> wsQuoteDetails-> OvermaxSizeSurcharge | Over-max Size Surcharge | Decimal | 
| wsAvailableServicesAndRates -> wsQuoteDetails-> OvermaxWeightSurcharge | Over-max Weight Surcharge | Decimal | 
| wsAvailableServicesAndRates -> wsQuoteDetails-> VATCharge | VAT Charge | Decimal | 
| wsAvailableServicesAndRates -> wsQuoteDetails-> InsuredCharge | Enhanced Cover Charge | Decimal | 
| wsAvailableServicesAndRates -> wsQuoteDetails-> TotalNetCharge | Total Net Charge | Decimal |

post.description:
Through 'WO Shipment Web service' shipments can be done based on input parameters.
# Table 1.1 - Service Name List
   ----------------------------

   **DXExpress Service Type List**
   | Sr. No.  | Service Type Name | 
   |----------|-------------------|

   # Table 1.3 – Package Type List

   | ----------|---------------------------------|
   | 1.    | Bill_To_Receiver |
   | 2.    | Bill_To_Sender |
   | 3.    | Bill_To_3rdParty |

requestBody.description:
# REQUEST DETAILS
  Shipment request consist of following elements:
  1. Authentication Details
  2. Sender Details
  3. Recipient Details  
  4. Shipping Details
  5. Additional Shipping Details
  6. Billing Details
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
**Authentication Details**
| Element Name | Description | Is Required | Data Type | Length |
| ------- | -------- | ------ | ---- | ----- |
| Key | Customer Login Id | YES | string | 100 |
| Password | Customer Password | YES | string | 100 |
| MeterNumber | Reference Number | YES | string | 100 |
| PluginCode | Only used in case of request from plugin else can be left blank. | NO | string | 100 |

---------------------------------------------------------------
**Sender Details**
| Element Name | Description | Is Required | Data Type | Length |
| ------- | -------- | ------ | ---- | ----- |
| Company | Name of Company | YES | string | 100|
| Name | Contact Name | YES | string | 100 |
| Address1 | Address1 | YES | string | 100 |
| Address2 | Address2 | No | string | 100|
| Address3 | Address3 | No | string | 100 |
| City | Sender City Name (Valid chars a-z OR A-Z OR 0-9) | YES | string | 100 |
| PostalCode | City Post Code (Valid chars a-z OR A-Z OR0-9) | YES | string | 100|
| PhoneDialCode | Area Dial Code (Valid chars 0-9) | No (Yes for TNT & DHL) | string | 100 |
| Phone | Phone Number (Valid chars 0-9) | YES | string | 100 |
| Email | Valid Email Address | YES | string | 100|


 ---------------------------------------------------------------
**Recipient Details**
| Element Name | Description | Is Required | Data Type | Length |
| ------- | -------- | ------ | ---- | ----- |
| Company | Name of Company | YES | string | 100|
| Name | Contact Name | YES | string | 100 |
| Address1 | Address1 | YES | string | 100 |
| Address2 | Address2 | No | string | 100|
| Address3 | Address3 | No | string | 100 |
| Country_Code | Two letter ISO Country code for recipient | YES | string | 4 |
| State_Code | State code for recipient state | No (Yes  if country  have states) | string | 5|
| City | Sender City Name (Valid chars a-z OR A-Z OR 0-9) | YES | string | 100 |
| PostalCode | City Post Code (Valid chars a-z OR A-Z OR 0-9) | YES | string | 100|
| PhoneDialCode | Area Dial Code (Valid chars 0-9) | No (Yes for TNT & DHL) | string | 100 |
| Phone | Phone Number (Valid chars 0-9) | YES | string | 100 |
| Email | Valid Email Address | YES | string | 100|
| Fax | Fax Number (Valid chars 0-9) | No | string | 100|
| Residential | Is Collection address residential | No | Boolean | |

---------------------------------------------------------------
**Shipping  Details**
| Element Name | Description | Is Required | Data Type | Length |
| ------- | -------- | ------ | ---- | ----- |
| ServiceType | Name of Service Company Type – wsServiceCompanyTypes (Refer Table 1.1 for service company list) | YES | Enum |  |
| ServiceTypeCode | Service type code corresponding to the service type – wsServiceTypes (Refer Table 1.2 for service type list)  | YES | Enum |  |
| PackageTypeCode | Package type code corresponding to the service type code – wsPackageTypes (Refer Table 1.3 for package type list)  | YES | Enum |  |
| isPOD | For carrier YODEL only. Mention IsPOD or IsNonPOD for B2C YODEL service type.  | No | Boolean |  |
| Description | Description for shipment  | Yes | Yes | 100 |
| Currency | Currency Type  | No | Enum | 100 |
| PackageDetail | Details of the package(wsShippingDetail.PackageDetail) | Yes (if Non Document) | Struct |
| PackageDetail -> ItemNumber | Sr. No of package in a collection | Yes | Int |  |
| PackageDetail -> Weight | Weight of package (Valid char’s 0-9.) | Yes | Decimal |  |
| PackageDetails -> Length | Length of package (Valid char’s 0-9.) | Yes | Decimal |  |
| PackageDetails -> Breadth | Breadth of package (Valid char’s 0-9.) | Yes | Decimal |  |
| PackageDetails -> Height | Height of package (Valid char’s 0-9.) | Yes | Decimal |  |
| PackageDetails -> CustomValue | Custom value (Valid char’s 0-9.) | Yes (If Non-European shipments) | Decimal |  |
| Insurance | Enhanced Value for shipment (Valid chars 0-9) | No | String | 100 |
| SenderVatNo | VAT No of Sender | No | String | 100 |
| CustomerReference | Customer Reference no. | No | String | 100 |


 ---------------------------------------------------------------
**Additional Shipment Details**
| Element Name | Description | Is Required | Data Type | Length |
| ------- | -------- | ------ | ---- | ----- |
| CommercialInvoiceType | CommercialInvoiceType  Type of commercial invoice – Commercial Invoice | YES | Enum | |
| ReceiverTaxId | Service type code corresponding to the service type – wsServiceTypes | No | string | 100 |
| TotalCalculatedValue |Total value calculated | YES | Decimal |  |
| TotalCustomValue | Total custom value calculated | Yes | Decimal | |
| TradeTerm | Term of Trade | No | string | 100 |
| GoodsDetail | Detail of Goods | Yes (If European Shipments) | Enum |  |
| GoodsDetail -> Description | Description for Goods | Yes | string | 5|
| GoodsDetail -> HTSNumber | Commodity Code for goods (Value should be between 1-9999) | No | string | 4 |
| GoodsDetail -> ItemNumber | Item number for goods. | No | string | 4 |
| GoodsDetail -> Wt | Weight of the Goods (Valid char’s 0-9) | yes | string | 4 |
| GoodsDetail -> Quantity | Quantity of Goods (Valid chars 0-9) | yes | string | 4 |
| GoodsDetail -> UnitPrice | Unit Price of Goods (Valid char’s 0-9) | yes | string | 4 |
| GoodsDetail -> ExportReason | Reason for Export - ReasonForExportTypes | yes | Enum |  |


 # Note -
----------------------------
 Additional shipment details shouldn’t be filled for European destination or envelope package type.

**Billing Details**
| Element Name | Description | Is Required | Data Type | Length |
| ------- | -------- | ------ | ---- | ----- |
| TransportationPayor | Transportation charges to be billed to – TransportationPayorTypes(Refer Table 1.7) | YES | Enum | |
| TransportationAccNumber | Account No of receiver if transportation charges are billed to receiver (Valid chars a-z OR A-Z OR 0-9) | Yes (If Billed to receiver) | string | 10 |
| DutiesPayor |Duties/Taxes/Fees to be paid by - DutiesPayorTypes(Refer Table 1.6) | YES | Enum |  |
| DutiesAccNumber | Account No of receiver if duties/taxes are paid by receiver (Valid chars a-z OR A-Z OR 0-9) | No | string |10 |
| CollectionOptions | Options for collection of shipment – CollectionOptionTypes | Yes | Enum |  |
| ReadyDate | Ready date of collection of shipment. Format should be dd/MM/YYYY | Yes (If I need to book collection) | String |  10|
| ReadyTime | Ready time of collection of shipment (Should be less than collection area’s collection cutoff time and close time) | Yes (If I need to book collection) | string | 5|
| CloseTime | Close time of collection of shipment (Should be less than collection area’s collection cutoff time ) | Yes (If I need to book collection) | string | 5 |
| PickUpLocation | Type of location of pick up – PickUpLocationTypes | Yes (If I need to book collection) | Enum | |
| LocationDescription | Description of pickup location | Yes (If I need to book collection) | string | 100 |
| PersonalMessage | Personal message to be associated with shipment | No | string | 100 |
| RecipientShipmentNotification | Is recipient to be notified when item is ready to be collected and dispatch | No | Boolean |  |
| RecipientDeliveryNotification | Is recipient to be notified for POD details of the delivery | No | Boolean |  |
| RecipientExceptionNotification | Is recipient to be notified for any form of delay, service change | No | Boolean |  |
| RecipientEmailAddress | Valid Email address of the recipient | No | String | 100 |
| OtherShipmentNotification | Any other to be notified when item is ready to be collected and dispatch | No | Boolean |  |
| OtherDeliveryNotification | Any other to be notified for POD details of the delivery| No | Boolean |  |
| OtherExceptionNotification | Any other to be notified for any form of delay, service change | No | Boolean |  |
| OtherEmailAddress | Valid Email address of any other to be notified except recipient | No | string | 100 |

200.description:
# RESONSE DETAILS ---------------------------- **Shipment Details** | Element Name | Description | Data Type | | ------- | -------- | ------ | | NotificationType | Status of shipment i.e. Success, Failed or Warning | Enum | | Message | Message displaying shipment booking | String | | CollectionDateNumber | Showing pickup date and signed by | string | | MasterTrackingNo | Master tracking number generated after shipment booking. | String | | Warning | Warning Warning message related to documents required for shipment. | String | | Labels->Image | Label Image in byte array form which needs to be converted into respective file format.
UPS-> .png String
FEDEX-> .png String
DHL-> .pdf String
TNT-> .html String
YODEL-> .pdf String | | Labels->ImageLength | Length of image label byte array. | int | | Labels-> LabelType | Type of label -> PDF ,PNG, Thermal. | String | | Labels-> LabelURL | URL to download label generated for shipment. | String |

post.description: Through 'WO Product Web service', will be display products to streamline commercial invoice generation for worldwide shipping.

200.description:
# RESONSE DETAILS
----------------------------
**Shipment Details**
| Element Name | Description | Data Type  |
| ------- | -------- | ------ | 
| NAME | product_name is name of the product. | String | 
| SKU | Message displaying shipment tracking status | String | 
| DETAILED EXPORT TITLE   | This will contain service information and rate details | Container | 
| HARMONIZATION CODE -> wsServiceCode | Code of the carrier service. | String | 
| ORIGIN COUNTRY | country | String | 
| DECLARED VALUE | declared_value | String |

requestBody.description:
# REQUEST DETAILS
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
| Element Name | Description | Is Required | Data Type | Length |
| ------- | -------- | ------ | ---- | ----- |
| includeDate | includeDate is used for filter data according to date | YES | bool | |
| fromDate | fromDate is used for filter data accroding to fromDate like DateRange | YES | string | | 
| toDate |toDate is used for filter data accroding to toDate like DateRange | YES | string | |
| searchVal | searchVal is used to filter data according to input text | No | string | |
| criteria | criteria is used to filter data according to Search By | No | int | |
| isWatchShipment | isWatchShipment flag get watch list tracking product | Yes | number | |
| curPage | Ready time of collection of shipment (Should be less than collection area’s collection cutoff time and close time) | Yes (If I need to book collection) | string | |
| recordsPerPage | Close time of collection of shipment (Should be less than collection area’s collection cutoff time ) | Yes (If I need to book collection) | string |  |
| hideMail | Type of location of pick up – PickUpLocationTypes | Yes (If I need to book collection) | Enum | |
